glsa.title: SplitVT: Privilege escalation
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in SplitVT may allow local users to gain escalated privileges.

background.p: SplitVT is a program for splitting terminals into two shells.

description.p: Mike Ashton reported that SplitVT does not drop group privileges before executing the xprop utility.

impact.p: A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain the "utmp" group privileges.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All SplitVT users should upgrade to the latest version:
